Text.Page:
[Special Orders]

, after you left Exodor the Valkyon Federation established a base in Exodor to explore the area and keep an eye on Azart movements in the vicinity.
We need to send supplies to this base, so come see me as soon as you see this.

- Seir
A familiar face can be seen in the distance.

Hi, nice to meet you!

I’m Anya!"Anya? Is it really you?"

Huh? Yes. Who else?

"Don’t you remember me?"

Ah, you seem to know me from somewhere else.
I’m sorry, but I’m not the Anya you know.
You don’t understand, do you?

You will, once I explain to you about this place. Come on, follow me.

This place is called Oscinium Agaia.

It connects different planes of existence that would never have crossed paths if it weren’t for dimensional instability.

You’ll see many more lookalikes of people from your world, just like me."I see."

Let me introduce you to this place.

Please listen carefully.
